Recently it was found that there were a few wrong assumptions made in our `Ephemeral Header` specification. I made a PR on the specs repo which resolve the problems found [Update Ephemeral Header specification to account for wrong assumptions #387](<https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/pull/387>).

All client Teams should review this PR to be aware how our `Ephemeral Header` specification is changing. A basic TLDR is we will now be using bridges instead of sideloading EL Headers from the `Beacon Network`. A concise description for the issues/reasons behind this change can be found in the PR. A lot more context can be found in <#1331654847648497726>, that discussion is quite long though üòÅ.
